p: It is worth noting that the spectrum of BZ100 is dominated by the 5D 0 → 7F 1 transition in the whole temperature range except at −100 °C. The PL variations are not determined by crystallographic modifications, as there is no correlation with the phase transitions (evidenced by white horizontal lines in Figs 3 and S5) in the ferroelectric samples while no transitions occur in relaxors.
